title: Sources
subtitle: Manage upstream data sources for your distributions

welcome.loginRequired: Please log in to view and manage upstream sources.

delete.title: Confirm Deletion
delete.confirmSingle: Are you sure you want to delete "{{ name }}"? This action cannot be undone.
delete.confirmMultiple: Are you sure you want to delete {{ count }} sources? This action cannot be undone.
delete.systemSourceError: Cannot delete system sources. Only user sources can be deleted.

detail.title: Source Details
detail.subtitle: View source details and sync available versions
detail.noVersions: No versions found. Try syncing to discover available versions.
detail.name: Name
detail.deleteWarning: Are you sure you want to delete "{{ name }}"? This will also remove all cached versions. This action cannot be undone.

component.label: Component
component.help: Select the component this source provides. Leave empty for generic sources.

retrievalMethod.label: Retrieval Method
retrievalMethod.help: Choose how to retrieve the source: download a release archive or clone the git repository.

urlTemplate.label: URL Template (optional)
urlTemplate.help: Custom URL template. Hover the ? icon for available variables. Leave empty to use component defaults.

templateHelp.title: Template Variables
templateHelp.description: Use these placeholders in your URL template. Example version: 6.12.5

priority.label: Priority
priority.help: Lower values have higher priority. Sources are sorted by priority ascending.

defaultVersion.label: Default Version (optional)
defaultVersion.help: Recommended version for this source. Auto-detected from latest release during sync if not set.

systemSource.label: System Source
systemSource.help: System sources are available to all users and can only be managed by administrators.

empty.user: You haven't created any sources yet.
